title: i got ddos then leaver buster?
body: i was ddos by either the top laner nasas or bot lane sona and kindread i was playing my game then all of a sudden my league closes and wont let me in game and when i restarted my computer i got on around 15min in and played till about 25 and then we lost and i got leaver buster

replies.body: [Leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) occurs on an account after multiple leaves, and not just a single game.  The more you have interruptions, the more your lower priority queue will escalate.  The best thing you can do is resolve whatever is causing it, and improve your standing with consistent play!

It does sound like your network lost connection to the game, but this can happen for various reasons like issues with your network or even an ISP hiccup.  You can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get a better idea of what actually went wrong.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network, and test it out in custom games to be sure.  Hope that helps!
